title: Strengthening CS Competencies: Science Domain Job Competencies via Competency-Based E-Learning Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners set and achieve goals to improve science-related job competencies by at least 80% using a competency-based e-learning system

Learners can collaborate with 3–5 team members over six months to solve a service design problem (e.g., improving customer complaint resolution processes) using PBL (Problem-Based Learning), prove collaborative problem-solving competencies via final outputs (report/prototype) and peer evaluations (average ≥4.0 on a 5-point scale).

Learners can complete formative assessments (3 questions) by each Friday, submit a 1-page competency development report based on results, and incorporate ≥2 improvement items into the next week’s learning plan.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
